section.name: 5 October, 2001 - HTTP Client 2.0 Alpha 1 Released
section.p: The HTTP Client revision 2.0 alpha 1 is available at http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-commons/release/commons-httpclient/v2.0/.

section.name: 25 April, 2001 - HTTP Client Proposal Accepted
section.p: The HTTP Client proposal has been accepted by the Jakarta Commons team and the source has been moved into the CVS repository.

section.name: 18 April, 2001 - HTTP Client Proposed
section.p: HTTP Client, originally developed by the Jakarta Slide team, has been proposed as a Jakarta Commons component.
